law.catch_line: Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive an examination requirement of this ti...

text.section:
Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive an examination requirement of this title for an individual who:
Is licensed to practice dietetics in another state or country;
Is registered to practice dietetics by the Commission on Dietetic Registration of the American Dietetic Association; or
Is certified by the Certification Board for Nutrition Specialists.

The Board may grant a waiver under this section only if the applicant:
Pays the application fee set by the Board under § 5-206 of this title; and
Provides adequate evidence that the applicant:
Meets the qualifications otherwise required by this subtitle; and
Became licensed in the other state or country after passing, in that state or country, an examination that the Board determines to be comparable to the examination for which the applicant is seeking the waiver;
Became registered by the Commission on Dietetic Registration of the American Dietetic Association after meeting the examination waiver requirements of that Commission or its predecessor; or
Became certified by the Certification Board for Nutrition Specialists after meeting the examination waiver requirements of that Certification Board or its predecessor.
